System Administration.description: System configuration, user management, and basic administration

Information Retrieval.description: System status, equipment, and configuration information

RTRV-HDR.description: Retrieve system header information including software version, NE type, and system status

RTRV-ALM-ALL.description: Retrieve all active alarms from the system

AID.description: Access identifier (optional - retrieves all if blank)

RTRV-ALM-ALL.response_format: List of active alarms with details

OPR-LPBK-T1.description: Operate loopback test on DS1 facility for testing and diagnostics

ORGN.description: Origin of signal to be looped back

LPBKTYPE.description: Point at which signal is looped back

RLS-LPBK-T1.description: Release loopback test on DS1 facility

ORGN.description: Origin of signal to be looped back

LPBKTYPE.description: Point at which signal is looped back

ENT-CRS-STS1.description: Create a new STS1 level cross-connection

RTRV-PM-STS1.description: Retrieve performance monitoring data for STS-1 facilities

ACT-USER.description: Activate a user account with specified privileges

AID.description: Equipment access identifier (ALL for all equipment)

RTRV-ALM.description: Retrieve active alarms with filtering options

ACK-ALM.description: Acknowledge active alarms to suppress notification

ALMID.description: Specific alarm ID to acknowledge (ALL for all)

RTRV-NMAP.description: Retrieve network topology and facility mapping

AID.hint: Leave blank for complete network map

RTRV-PM.description: Retrieve performance monitoring data for facilities

TST-LPB.description: Initiate loopback test on specified facility

AID.description: Access identifier for facility to test
Access identifier for equipment to reset

RMV-CRS-STS1.description: Remove an existing STS1 level cross-connection

ED-CRS-STS1.description: Modify an existing STS1 level cross-connection

CPY-MEM.description: Copy database or configuration from one location to another

RTRV-COND.description: Retrieve current alarm conditions and status

ENT-EQPT.description: Enter new equipment into the system

RTRV-DAT.description: Retrieve current system date and time

ENT-USER.description: Create new user account with access privileges

ED-USER.description: Modify user account privileges and settings

RTRV-VER.description: Retrieve software and hardware version information

RTRV-SLOT.description: Retrieve slot configuration and card information

RTRV-INV.description: Retrieve equipment inventory and serial numbers
